username.description: Label for the username or email field

placeholder_username.description: Placeholder text for the username input field

placeholder_password.description: Placeholder text for the password input field

notification_username_copied.description: Notification message when the username is successfully copied to the clipboard

notification_password_copied.description: Notification message when the password is successfully copied to the clipboard

error_login_not_found.message: Something went wrong. Login not found.
error_login_not_found.description: Error message displayed when the requested login item is not found

error_username_copy_failed.message: Failed to copy username to clipboard.
error_username_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the username to the clipboard fails

error_password_copy_failed.message: Failed to copy password to clipboard.
error_password_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the password to the clipboard fails

placeholder_domain_uri.description: Placeholder text for the domain or URI input field
